findings.title: Owner Privileges
findings.description: The contract contains ownership functionality and ownership is not renounced which allows the creator or current owner to modify contract behaviour (for example, disable selling or mint new tokens).

findings.title: Volatile Code:
findings.description: The return values of functions _swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens_ and _addLiquidityETH_ are not properly handled.

findings.title: Unprotected Ether Withdrawal: L940 - 947;
findings.description: Unprotected public and external functions were found which were accepting addresses controlled by external users, allowing for unauthorized ether withdrawal.

findings.title: Third-Party Dependency:
findings.description: The audit assumes 3rd party entities are black boxes and functional correctness, but they can be compromised leading to lost or stolen assets.
